snippet: The authorities said the former Detroit Lions receiver Titus Young had been arrested in California for the third time in a week.
abstract: Authorities say former Detroit Lions receiver Titus Young has been arrested in California for third time in a week; he allegedly broke into a home and fought with deputies after a foot chase.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said the former Detroit Lions receiver Titus Young had been arrested in California for the third time in a week.

headline.seo: Former Lion Titus Young Arrested Again
